text.div:
HSPC Temperature Units of Measure Value Set

The codes that describe the units of measure used for temperature.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://unitsofmeasure.org
    CodeDisplay
    [degF]Fahrenheit
    CelCelsius

name: HSPC Temperature Units of Measure Value Set
description: The codes that describe the units of measure used for temperature.
copyright: This value set includes content from UCUM. Implementer use of UCUM is not covered by this agreement
